critter.name: Pale Chub
critter.desc: The pale chub is a river fish with simple black-and-silver coloring. Interestingly, the male's coloring becomes more vibrant when he's trying to attract a mate! Though normally plain, these fellows really known how to look stylish when they want to. Perhaps I could learn a thing or two from the pale chub...
critter.quote: I caught a pale chub! That name seems a bit judgy...
